product_name: Riverside Heavy Duty Utility Straps Twin Pack - 9 ft.
long_description: Choose the Riverside Heavy Duty Utility Straps for securing your gear to the roof of your car. 1 in. heavy-duty webbing features extra-strength stitiching. Galvanized buckle features a buckle protector to prevent scratching; buckle protector can be slid on or off. Center-spring mounted cams offer a strong, secure grip. Includes two 9 ft. straps.
short_description: Choose the Riverside Heavy Duty Utility Straps for securing your gear to the roof of your car.
